comments:
I am trying to mirror features with the standaloneUpdate for eclipse 3.2 (M20060609-1217).
Using the sun jdk 1.4.2 it works though i get a org.xml.sax.SAXParseException that is ignored (see below for the complete log).
Using the sun jdk 1.5 it aborts with a org.eclipse.update.internal.core.FatalIOException (see below for the complete log).
Installing the same feature with the standaloneUpdate works fine with both jkd's.

Logs:
------------------ with jdk 1.4.2 ------------------------------
java -cp startup.jar org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main -application org.eclipse.update.core.standaloneUpdate -command mirror -from http://download.eclipse.org/callisto/releases/ -featureId org.eclipse.cdt -version 3.1.0.200605290500 -to file:/home/mol/tmp/zzz -consolelog
Analyzing features already mirrored ...  Done.

Command failed. Please check log file /home/mol/workspace/.metadata/.log for details.

When attempting to download the pack.gz file retrieveLocalJar catches IOException and then just downloads the normal jar.

During a normal update, when a progress monitor is being used, a FatalIOException is thrown from FeaturePackagedContentProvider.asLocalReference line 228 when trying to get the size to display in the monitor.  This is caught properly and we proceed with the normal jar.

When there is no progress monitor, (ie standaloneUpdate), FatalIOException is thrown by checkConnectionResult, but it is caught by asLocalReference and wrapped in a CoreException, which is not caught by the retrieveLocalJar.

Note, a workaround is to set the system property to turn off pack200:
-Dorg.eclipse.update.jarprocessor.pack200=@none
*** Bug 152963 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Created an attachment (id=47528)
Patch

Attached patch catches the CoreException when the pack.gz file is not found and proceeds with the normal Jar download.

traces.message: Character conversion error: "Malformed UTF-8 char -- is an XML encoding declaration missing?" (line number may be too low).
Server returned HTTP response code: "404 Not Found" for URL: http://download.eclipse.org/callisto/releases/plugins/org.eclipse.cdt.core_3.1.0.200605290500.jar.pack.gz.
